verses.verse: In the five <WH2568> and twentieth <WH6242> year <WH8141> of our captivity <WH1546>, in the beginning <WH7218> of the year <WH8141>, in the tenth <WH6218> day of the month <WH2320>, in the fourteenth <WH702> year <WH8141> after <WH310> that the city <WH5892> was smitten <WH5221>, in the selfsame <WH6106> day <WH3117>, the hand <WH3027> of Jehovah <WH3068> was upon me <WH935>, and he brought me thither.

In the visions <WH4759> of God <WH430> brought <WH935> he me into the land <WH776> of Israel <WH3478>, and set <WH5117> me down upon a very <WH3966> high <WH1364> mountain <WH2022>, whereon was as it were the frame <WH4011> of a city <WH5892> on the south <WH5045>.

And he brought <WH935> me thither <WH376>; and, behold, there was a man, whose appearance <WH4758> was like the appearance <WH4758> of brass <WH5178>, with a line <WH6616> of flax <WH6593> in his hand <WH3027>, and a measuring <WH4060> reed <WH7070>; and he stood <WH5975> in the gate <WH8179>.

And the man <WH376> said <WH1696> unto me <WH1121>, Son of man <WH120>, behold <WH7200> with thine eyes <WH5869>, and hear <WH8085> with thine ears <WH241>, and set <WH7760> thy heart <WH3820> upon all that I shall show <WH7200> thee <WH4616>; for, to the intent that I may show <WH7200> them unto thee <WH935>, art thou brought hither <WH5046>: declare all that thou seest <WH7200> to the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>.

And <WH2346>, behold, a wall on the outside <WH2351> of the house <WH1004> round about <WH5439>, and in the man <WH376>'s hand <WH3027> a measuring <WH4060> reed <WH7070> six <WH8337> cubits <WH520> long <WH520>, of a cubit and a handbreadth <WH2948> each <WH4058>: so he measured the thickness <WH2948> of the building <WH1146>, one <WH259> reed <WH7070>; and the height <WH6967>, one <WH259> reed <WH7070>.

Then came <WH935> he unto the gate <WH8179> which looketh <WH6440> toward <WH1870> the east <WH6921>, and went up <WH5927> the steps <WH4609> thereof <WH4058>: and he measured the threshold <WH5592> of the gate <WH8179>, one <WH259> reed <WH7070> broad <WH7341>; and the other <WH259> threshold <WH5592>, one <WH259> reed <WH7070> broad <WH7341>.

And every lodge <WH8372> was one <WH259> reed <WH7070> long <WH753>, and one <WH259> reed <WH7070> broad <WH7341>; and the space between the lodges <WH8372> was five <WH2568> cubits <WH520>; and the threshold <WH5592> of the gate <WH8179> by <WH681> the porch <WH197> of the gate <WH8179> toward <WH1004> the house was one <WH259> reed <WH7070>.
He measured <WH4058> also the porch <WH197> of the gate <WH8179> toward <WH1004> the house <WH259>, one reed <WH7070>.

Then measured <WH4058> he the porch <WH197> of the gate <WH8179>, eight <WH8083> cubits <WH520>; and the posts <WH352> thereof <WH8147>, two cubits <WH520>; and the porch <WH197> of the gate <WH8179> was toward the house <WH1004>.

And the lodges <WH8372> of the gate <WH8179> eastward <WH1870> were three <WH7969> on this side <WH6311>, and three <WH7969> on that side <WH6311>; they three <WH7969> were of one <WH259> measure <WH4060>: and the posts <WH352> had one <WH259> measure on this side and on that side <WH4060>.
And he measured <WH4058> the breadth <WH7341> of the opening <WH6607> of the gate <WH8179>, ten <WH6235> cubits <WH520>; and the length <WH753> of the gate <WH8179>, thirteen <WH7969> cubits <WH520>;

and a border <WH1366> before <WH6440> the lodges <WH8372>, one <WH259> cubit <WH520> on this side <WH1366>, and a border, one cubit <WH520> on that side <WH8372>; and the lodges, six <WH8337> cubits <WH520> on this side <WH8337>, and six cubits on that side <WH520>.

And he measured <WH4058> the gate <WH8179> from the roof <WH1406> of the one lodge <WH8372> to the roof <WH1406> of the other <WH7341>, a breadth of five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520>; door <WH6607> against door <WH6607>.
He made <WH6213> also posts <WH352>, threescore <WH8346> cubits <WH520>; and the court <WH2691> reached unto the posts <WH352>, round about <WH5439> the gate <WH8179>.
And from the forefront <WH6440> of the gate <WH8179> at the entrance <WH2978> unto the forefront <WH6440> of the inner <WH6442> porch <WH197> of the gate <WH8179> were fifty <WH2572> cubits <WH520>.

And there were closed <WH331> windows <WH2474> to the lodges <WH8372>, and to their posts <WH352> within <WH6441> the gate <WH8179> round about <WH5439>, and likewise to the arches <WH361>; and windows <WH2474> were round about <WH5439> inward <WH6441>; and upon each post <WH352> were palm-trees <WH8561>.

Then brought <WH935> he me into the outer <WH2435> court <WH2691>; and <WH3957>, lo, there were chambers and a pavement <WH7531>, made <WH6213> for the court <WH2691> round about <WH5439>: thirty <WH7970> chambers <WH3957> were upon the pavement <WH7531>.
And the pavement <WH7531> was by the side <WH3802> of the gates <WH8179>, answerable <WH5980> unto the length <WH753> of the gates <WH8179>, even the lower <WH8481> pavement <WH7531>.

Then he measured <WH4058> the breadth <WH7341> from the forefront <WH6440> of the lower <WH8481> gate <WH8179> unto the forefront <WH6440> of the inner <WH6442> court <WH2691> without <WH2351>, a hundred <WH3967> cubits <WH520>, both on the east <WH6921> and on the north <WH6828>.

And the gate <WH8179> of the outer <WH2435> court <WH2691> whose prospect <WH6440> is toward <WH1870> the north <WH6828>, he measured <WH4058> the length <WH753> thereof and the breadth thereof <WH7341>.

And the lodges <WH8372> thereof were three <WH7969> on this side and three <WH7969> on that side <WH352>; and the posts thereof and the arches <WH361> thereof were after the measure <WH4060> of the first <WH7223> gate <WH8179>: the length <WH753> thereof was fifty <WH2572> cubits <WH520>, and the breadth <WH7341> five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520>.

And the windows <WH2474> thereof <WH361>, and the arches thereof <WH8561>, and the palm-trees thereof <WH4060>, were after the measure of the gate <WH8179> whose prospect <WH6440> is toward <WH1870> the east <WH6921>; and they went up <WH5927> unto it by seven <WH7651> steps <WH4609>; and the arches <WH361> thereof were before them <WH6440>.

And there was a gate <WH8179> to the inner <WH6442> court <WH2691> over against the other gate <WH8179>, both on the north <WH6828> and on the east <WH6921>; and he measured <WH4058> from gate <WH8179> to gate <WH8179> a hundred <WH3967> cubits <WH520>.

And he led <WH3212> me toward <WH1870> the south <WH1864>; and <WH8179>, behold, a gate toward <WH1870> the south <WH1864>: and he measured <WH4058> the posts <WH352> thereof and the arches <WH361> thereof according to these measures <WH4060>.

And there were windows <WH2474> in it and in the arches <WH361> thereof round about <WH5439>, like those windows <WH2474>: the length <WH753> was fifty <WH2572> cubits <WH520>, and the breadth <WH7341> five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520>.

And there were seven <WH7651> steps <WH4609> to go up <WH5930> to it <WH361>, and the arches thereof were before <WH6440> them <WH8561>; and it had palm-trees, one <WH259> on this side <WH259>, and another on that side <WH352>, upon the posts thereof.

And there was a gate <WH8179> to the inner <WH6442> court <WH2691> toward <WH1870> the south <WH1864>: and he measured <WH4058> from gate <WH8179> to gate <WH8179> toward <WH1870> the south <WH1864> a hundred <WH3967> cubits <WH520>.
Then he brought <WH935> me to the inner <WH6442> court <WH2691> by the south <WH1864> gate <WH8179>: and he measured <WH4058> the south <WH1864> gate <WH8179> according to these measures <WH4060>;

and the lodges <WH8372> thereof <WH352>, and the posts thereof <WH361>, and the arches thereof <WH4060>, according to these measures: and there were windows <WH2474> in it and in the arches <WH361> thereof round about <WH5439>; it was fifty <WH2572> cubits <WH520> long <WH753>, and five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520> broad <WH7341>.
And there were arches <WH361> round about <WH5439>, five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520> long <WH753>, and five <WH2568> cubits <WH520> broad <WH7341>.

And the arches <WH361> thereof were toward the outer <WH2435> court <WH2691>; and palm-trees <WH8561> were upon the posts <WH352> thereof <WH4608>: and the ascent to it had eight <WH8083> steps <WH4609>.
And he brought <WH935> me into the inner <WH6442> court <WH2691> toward <WH1870> the east <WH6921>: and he measured <WH4058> the gate <WH8179> according to these measures <WH4060>;

and the lodges <WH8372> thereof <WH352>, and the posts thereof <WH361>, and the arches thereof <WH4060>, according to these measures: and there were windows <WH2474> therein and in the arches <WH361> thereof round about <WH5439>; it was fifty <WH2572> cubits <WH520> long <WH753>, and five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520> broad <WH7341>.

And the arches <WH361> thereof were toward the outer <WH2435> court <WH2691>; and palm-trees <WH8561> were upon the posts <WH352> thereof <WH4608>, on this side, and on that side: and the ascent to it had eight <WH8083> steps <WH4609>.
And he brought <WH935> me to the north <WH6828> gate <WH8179>: and he measured <WH4058> it according to these measures <WH4060>;

the lodges <WH8372> thereof <WH352>, the posts thereof <WH361>, and the arches thereof <WH2474>: and there were windows therein round about <WH5439>; the length <WH753> was fifty <WH2572> cubits <WH520>, and the breadth <WH7341> five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520>.

And the posts <WH352> thereof were toward the outer <WH2435> court <WH2691>; and palm-trees <WH8561> were upon the posts <WH352> thereof <WH4608>, on this side, and on that side: and the ascent to it had eight <WH8083> steps <WH4609>.
And a chamber <WH3957> with the door <WH6607> thereof was by the posts <WH352> at the gates <WH8179>; there they washed <WH1740> the burnt-offering <WH5930>.

And in the porch <WH197> of the gate <WH8179> were two <WH8147> tables <WH7979> on this side <WH7979>, and two tables on that side <WH7819>, to slay thereon the burnt-offering <WH5930> and the sin-offering <WH2403> and the trespass-offering <WH817>.

And on the one side <WH3802> without <WH2351>, as one goeth up <WH5927> to the entry <WH6607> of the gate <WH8179> toward the north <WH6828>, were two <WH8147> tables <WH7979>; and on the other <WH312> side <WH3802>, which belonged to the porch <WH197> of the gate <WH8179>, were two <WH8147> tables <WH7979>.

Four <WH702> tables <WH7979> were on this side <WH702>, and four tables <WH7979> on that side <WH3802>, by the side of the gate <WH8179>; eight <WH8083> tables <WH7979>, whereupon they slew the sacrifices <WH7819>.

And there were four <WH702> tables <WH7979> for the burnt-offering <WH5930>, of hewn <WH1496> stone <WH68>, a cubit <WH520> and a half <WH2677> long <WH753>, and a cubit <WH520> and a half <WH2677> broad <WH7341>, and one <WH259> cubit <WH520> high <WH1363>; whereupon they laid <WH3240> the instruments <WH3627> wherewith they slew <WH7819> the burnt-offering <WH5930> and the sacrifice <WH2077>.
And the hooks <WH8240>, a <WH259> handbreadth <WH2948> long <WH3559>, were fastened within <WH1004> round about <WH5439>: and upon the tables <WH7979> was the flesh <WH1320> of the oblation <WH7133>.

And without <WH2351> the inner <WH6442> gate <WH8179> were chambers <WH3957> for the singers <WH7891> in the inner <WH6442> court <WH2691>, which was at the side <WH3802> of the north <WH6828> gate <WH8179>; and their prospect <WH6440> was toward <WH1870> the south <WH1864>; one <WH259> at the side <WH3802> of the east <WH6921> gate <WH8179> having the prospect <WH6440> toward <WH1870> the north <WH6828>.

And he said <WH1696> unto me <WH2090>, This chamber <WH3957>, whose prospect <WH6440> is toward <WH1870> the south <WH1864>, is for the priests <WH3548>, the keepers <WH8104> of the charge <WH4931> of the house <WH1004>;

and the chamber <WH3957> whose prospect <WH6440> is toward <WH1870> the north <WH6828> is for the priests <WH3548>, the keepers <WH8104> of the charge <WH4931> of the altar <WH4196>: these are the sons <WH1121> of Zadok <WH6659>, who from among the sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> come near <WH7131> to Jehovah <WH3068> to minister unto him <WH8334>.

And he measured <WH4058> the court <WH2691>, a hundred <WH3967> cubits <WH520> long <WH753>, and a hundred <WH3967> cubits <WH520> broad <WH7341>, foursquare <WH7251>; and the altar <WH4196> was before <WH6440> the house <WH1004>.

Then he brought <WH935> me to the porch <WH197> of the house <WH1004>, and measured <WH4058> each post <WH352> of the porch <WH197>, five <WH2568> cubits <WH520> on this side <WH2568>, and five cubits <WH520> on that side <WH7341>: and the breadth of the gate <WH8179> was three <WH7969> cubits <WH520> on this side <WH7969>, and three cubits on that side <WH520>.

The length <WH753> of the porch <WH197> was twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520>, and the breadth <WH7341> eleven <WH6249> cubits <WH520>; even by the steps <WH4609> whereby they went up <WH5927> to it <WH5982>: and there were pillars by the posts <WH352>, one <WH259> on this side <WH259>, and another on that side.
